name: Patagonia Down Sweater Vest - Women's
description: Powerful warmth in a light, packable layer, the Patagonia Down Vest is the modern standard for alpine missions and extreme weather anywhere. The weather-resistant outer fabric is extremely light and has a good amount of abrasion resistance. The Traceable down is third-party certified to be non-live plucked and supplied from a facility that does not practice force feeding. Quilted construction keeps the down in place and the clean design is roomy enough to accommodate base layers.Shell and lining are recycled polyester ripstop with a DWR finish to keep it water-resistant and windproof.Insulated with high-loft, premium, 800-fill-power traceable goose down.Sewn-through quilted construction.Full-length, lightweight Vislon zipper with internal storm flap and zipper garage.2 zippered hand pockets.Internal pocket has a carabiner clip and doubles as the jacket's stuff sack.Nylon-bound elastic armholes seal in warmth.Drawcord hem adjusts from inside the handwarmer pockets.
